questions.question: Modern technology challenges SSW's to think critically about:
When should SSW's inform their clients about technology and social media policies?

choices.answer: If you get a "friend request" from a client
Before you follow them on twitter or if you notice they are following you
During the first meeting when discussing confidentiality and boundary issue
Once you develop a strong relationship with them

questions.question: ﻿Misunderstandings are likely to happen when communicating using technology because:

choices.answer: You don't know what your client looks like
Your client is afraid of technology

questions.question: When speaking to your client and you check your text/email, this suggests:
Before you press "send" on an email, you should:

choices.answer: Make sure it is polite and the right level of formality
That you have used a greeting and signed off with your name

questions.question: Why are emoticons typically used?

choices.answer: To express an emotion that is hard to convey in writing

questions.question: Appropriate content for your social media includes:

choices.answer: anything you wouldn't mind having subpoenaed in court
anything you wouldn't mind seeing on the evening news.
anything you wouldn't mind your boss seeing

questions.question: You should always say "YES" if a client requests to be your "friend" on Facebook.
SSW's should not use social media with clients unless it is needed to provide services.
Typically, it is most appropriate to connect with clients via:
SSW's can connect with clients socially after the end of the professional relationship.
When it is it appropriate to take a call from a client?

choices.answer: If you get a call late at night
During a meeting with another client

questions.question: Which one of these is a benefit to technology in SSW practice?

choices.answer: Your clients can reach you at anytime
Clients who have difficulty travelling can access services
You can become Facebook friends with your clients
Your clients can read about you online through social media

questions.question: Technology must be approached with the same level of rigor and professionalism as meeting with a client physically
Ensuring you are meeting on a secure line (or web format) is important working with clients virtually.
Why is texting a great way to connect with youth clients?

choices.answer: So you don't have to deal with their attitude
So you can meet with more clients in a day
Because youth use this as their major form of communication

questions.question: It is appropriate to have a public social media profile with pictures of you partying when you are an SSW.
It is important to 'google' yourself to see what potential clients will see about you on the internet.
To increase your online safety:

choices.answer: use different passwords for work related accounts

questions.question: Technology is bad for the Social Service Worker field.
